{{DISPLAYTITLE:Sector_SetCeilingScale}} {{Special|188|tag, u-int, u-frac, v-int, v-frac|Sector|CeilingScale|Sector_SetCeilingScale}}
{{Special|170|tag, u-fixed, v-fixed|Sector|CeilingScale|Sector_SetCeilingScale2|nosort=1}}
* ''tag'': Tag of affected sector * ''u-int'': Integral part of the horizontal scalar * ''u-frac'': Fractional part of the horizontal scalar * ''v-int'': Integral part of the vertical scalar * ''v-frac'': Fractional part of the vertical scalar * ''u-fixed'': horizontal scaling factor as fixed point value * ''v-fixed'': vertical scaling factor as fixed point value Scales the ceiling texture in the specified sector horizontally (x) and/or vertically (y). The formula for calculating a scaling value with the specials is the same as [[Sector_SetCeilingPanning]] and [[Sector_SetFloorPanning]]. Sector_SetCeilingScale2 allows to specify the scaling factor directly as fixed point value. As a result, it cannot be used on a line; only in a script. == UDMF == If you are using [[UDMF]] and do not intend to modify the ceiling's scale later on, you can directly set this in [[Fixed point numbers|fixed point]] under the sector's ''custom'' tab.
